name: Shield of Missile Attraction
entries: While holding this shield, you have resistance to damage from ranged weapon attacks.

entries.name: Curse
entries: This shield is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by the {@spell remove curse} spell or similar magic. Removing the shield fails to end the curse on you. Whenever a ranged weapon attack is made against a target within 10 feet of you, the curse causes you to become the target instead.
